attributes.action: Remove the need for a Covid Vaccine Pass to enter venues
attributes.additional_details:
Making it a requirement for younger people to be fully vaccinated to enter these kinds of venues is taking away their freedom if they choose to not be vaccinated against a virus of which they are typically at very low risk.

It has been seen that being vaccinated does not prevent you from getting the virus and does not prevent you from becoming ill.

Proof of a negative test would surely be far more suitable to prevent the spread of the virus while still allowing freedom for those who are safe.
attributes.background: Remove the requirement for people to have been fully vaccinated before they can attend larger events, such as those at nightclubs.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not require Covid vaccination passports for crowded events: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592671

Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
